0.2.2.name: wordpress/gc-comments
0.2.2.description:
GC-Comments retrieves a list of commented on posts, ordered by last commented on article first. It displays them as an unordered list containing a link to the article, as well as a link to the last comment in that conversation:

  • article_title1 (number_of_comments1)
  • article_title2 (number_of_comments2)

It has the following features:

  • Can be used as a widget and in code
  • Customizable css class name.
  • Customizable number of commented on posts to retrieve.
  • Caching: for large databases the query can be quite resource intensive. Caching reduces the strain on the database by storing the results of the query-results in the database. Select caching per comment or time based (Cache time configurable).
  • AJAX: Use this when your blog uses WP Super Cache or equivalent, or if you just want to keep your readers updated on the latest comments regularly (AJAX refresh time configurable).
  • Option to include or
